sentences.sContent: Cold worlds shake from the oar.
sentences.sCn: 冰冷的世界从桨上摇落。

sentences.sContent: Suchen never understood what had driven her to grasp the oar at the last moment.
sentences.sCn: 苏晨从来没有想明白，是什么驱使她在最后一刻抓住了一条船桨。

trans.tranOther: a long pole with a wide flat blade at one end, used for rowing a boat
